name: BollywoodHungamaMovieReviewinEnglish
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A summary of the latest flick to hit screens that delves into the details of what to expect from the film in terms of performances from the cast, direction, execution, writing and music.
Apart from this you can also gain a better understanding of a film's box office prospect based on its rating. The film reviews are updated every week or on the date when the film is slated to release.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
